title: Alexander Turnbull's library
creator_credit: Paul Maunder, Ronald Bowie and New Zealand National Film Unit
brief_description: The film takes the viewer through an ordinary day of the famous Alexander Turnbull Library showing glimpses of the treasures - rare books, New Zealand and Pacific collection, manuscripts and paintings. The viewer learns that the historic building is no longer safe, and is about to be destroyed for the construction of a motorway.
